remarks: Value of the half-plane relation for a given line ` D ` .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Mar-2020.)
statement:
ishpg.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
ishpg.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
ishpg.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
ishpg.o $e |- O = { <. a , b >. | ( ( a e. ( P \ D ) /\ b e. ( P \ D ) ) /\ E. t e. D t e. ( a I b ) ) } $.
ishpg.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
ishpg.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. ran L ) $.
ishpg $p |- ( ph -> ( ( hpG ` G ) ` D ) = { <. a , b >. | E. c e. P ( a O c /\ b O c ) } ) $.
$d D a b c t $.
$d G a b $.
$d I a b c t $.
$d P a b c t $.
$d a b c ph $.
